ChunkText: transfer out during OPT students who want to begin a new degree program in f-1 status are welcome to transfer to another school to being that program, or begin that program at umbc. students in f-1 status will need to transfer their I-20 to the new school of their choice.
ContextAfter: and the requirements for changing to a new degree program at umbc here please note that your OPT authorization is connected to your umbc i-20. transferring your I-20 during OPT will end your OPT automatically. the unused OPT time cannot be regained for use at another time it is simply forfeited.
